Job description 

• Accept and resolve L1 requests and incidents following our IT knowledge database, IT solutions and guidelines. 

• Accept and resolve L2 requests and incidents using our IT solutions tools and consoles. 

• Accept clients phone calls and contact clients via phone and emails to assist in resolving requests and incidents. 

• Use our remote management software to resolve requests and incidents. 

• Escalade tickets to L3 engineers and work with them if needed. 

• Update IT knowledge database and inventories. 

• Monitor our IT infrastructure and create incident tickets. 

• Backup field engineer if needed. 



Contract Info: 

• Permanent contract with 3-months’ probation period 

• Standard 40 hours per week 

• 5 weeks of holiday per year 

• Salary based on experience
requirements:
Qualifications 

• Native Korean or F visa holder with an advanced Korean level 

• Degree or certification in Information Technology with a first experience in the IT industry. 

• Advanced English level and comfortable working in a multi-lingual and cross-cultural environment. 

• Excellent customer service skills with clear verbal communication. 

• Good understanding of computer hardware, windows 10/11, MS Office Apps and software application. 

• Good understanding of Active Directory (Domain, OU, user accounts, computers, security groups, mailing lists). 

• Knowledge in network (IPv4, DHCP, DNS, Layer 2/3 protocol).
